blogPost.title: Spotify patent would suggest songs based on users' emotions
blogPost.author: walterbell

localize.title: Spotify专利将根据用户的情绪推荐歌曲
Spotify專利將根據用戶的情緒推薦歌曲

previous.excerpt:
Check the nasdaq daily short volume data. GME was shorted 77% of the volume
yesterday. Short attacks and not a sell off. Don’t confuse daily short volume
data with short interest data which comes out tonight and twice a month.

Go to the official government site…
previous.title: PROOF that GME is not a sell off but short attacks

localize.title: 证明GME不是抛售而是空头攻击
localize.the_new_excerpt:
查看纳斯达克每日空头成交量数据。GME被做空的量占77%。
昨日，。空头攻击，而不是抛售。不要把每天的空头成交量混为一谈
数据与短息数据，今晚出炉，每月两次。

去政府官方网站...

localize.title: 證明GME不是拋售而是空頭攻擊
localize.the_new_excerpt:
查看納斯達克每日空頭成交量數據。GME被做空的量佔77%。
昨日，。空頭攻擊，而不是拋售。不要把每天的空頭成交量混爲一談
數據與短息數據，今晚出爐，每月兩次。

去政府官方網站...
